title: Sidewall, 1905–15
inscribed: Printed in right selvedge: "C&W" pattern number "4783".
description: Floral medallions with yellow rose bouquets and vining, foliate scrolls and beading connected by beaded floral swag hanging from small foliate medallions.  Secondary pattern of monochrome green foliate vining outlines medallions. Printed in light yellow, white, greens, light blue and metallic gold on ribbed ground covered in white liquid mica. Printed in right selvedge: "C&W" pattern number "4783".

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1905–15.
1905–15. Machine-printed, ribbed ground, mica, liquid. Gift of Victorian Collectibles. 1979-91-1200.
